reviews.review_msg: The best professor. Sounds like Markiplier. Says hello everyone at the start of the class. makes him sound more like markiplier. take this class 10/10

Will always ensures that he engages his class with every lecture and assessment he conducts. Very charismatic, compassionate and open-minded. When I took REM 320W I began to take any course he taught because of how amazing of an instructor he is.
